law.catch_line: Display And Sale Of Glass Etching Products.
law.full_text:
DISPLAY AND SALE OF GLASS ETCHING PRODUCTS. (Added by Ord. No. 174,361, Eff. 1/13/02.)
(a) Every person who owns, conducts, operates or manages a retail commercial establishment selling glass etching cream, or any commercially available glass etching product, whether sold separately or in a kit, shall store or cause to be stored such glass etching cream or glass etching product under lock and key in an area viewable by, but not accessible to the public in the regular course of business without employee assistance, pending legal sale or disposition of such glass etching cream or glass etching product.
(b) No person who owns, conducts, operates or manages a retail commercial establishment selling glass etching cream or any commercially available glass etching product, whether sold separately or in a kit, shall sell or caused to be sold any such glass etching cream or glass etching product to any person who has not yet attained the age of 18 years.

dublin_core.Title: Display And Sale Of Glass Etching Products.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
DISPLAY AND SALE OF GLASS ETCHING PRODUCTS. (§ 47.16)
DISPLAY AND SALE OF GLASS ETCHING PRODUCTS. (Added by Ord. No. 174,361, Eff. 1/13/02.) (a) Every person who owns, conducts, operates or manages a retail commercial establishment selling glass etching cream, or any commercially available glass etching product, whether sold separately or in a kit, shall store or cause to be stored such glass etching cream or glass etching product under lock and key in an area viewable by, but not accessible to the public in the regular course of business without employee assistance, pending legal sale or disposition of such glass etching cream or glass etching product. (b) No person who owns, conducts, operates or manages a retail commercial establishment selling glass etching cream or any commercially available glass etching product, whether sold separately or in a kit, shall sell or caused to be sold any such glass etching cream or glass etching product to any person who has not yet attained the age of 18 years.
law.html:
DISPLAY AND SALE OF GLASS ETCHING PRODUCTS. (Added by Ord. No. 174,361, Eff. 1/13/02.)

(a) Every person who owns, conducts, operates or manages a retail commercial establishment selling glass etching cream, or any commercially available glass etching product, whether sold separately or in a kit, shall store or cause to be stored such glass etching cream or glass etching product under lock and key in an area viewable by, but not accessible to the public in the regular course of business without employee assistance, pending legal sale or disposition of such glass etching cream or  glass etching product.

(b) No person who owns, conducts, operates or manages a retail commercial establishment selling glass etching cream or any commercially available glass etching product, whether sold separately or in a kit, shall  sell or caused to be sold any such glass etching cream or glass etching product to any person who has not yet attained the age of 18 years.
